title: HR Leave Policy
content: Employees are entitled to 24 paid leaves annually. Unused leaves can be carried forward up to 12 days. All leave applications must be approved by the reporting manager and HR.

title: IT Infrastructure Overview
content: The IT department manages internal systems including the email server, CI/CD pipeline, and network security.

title: Company Vision and Strategy 2025
content: Our long-term goal is to expand into Southeast Asian markets with a focus on AI-driven solutions.

title: Performance Review Guidelines
content: Performance reviews are conducted biannually. Managers should provide constructive feedback supported by performance metrics and peer reviews.

title: Employee Benefits Summary
content: All employees are eligible for medical insurance, wellness programs, and annual health check-ups under the general benefits policy.

title: HR Recruitment Workflow
content: The recruitment pipeline involves screening, technical rounds, and final HR evaluation. All data must be stored securely and accessed only by HR personnel.

title: Departmental Budget Allocation 2025
content: Each department has been allocated its budget for 2025. This document outlines projected expenditures for IT, HR, and Operations.

title: Incident Response Plan
content: The IT department should follow this protocol when responding to cybersecurity incidents, including breach identification, containment, and reporting.

title: Cross-Departmental Collaboration Guidelines
content: Managers from different departments should coordinate via biweekly syncs and shared OKRs to align project priorities.

title: Onboarding Checklist
content: This checklist includes account setup, laptop issuance, orientation schedules, and mandatory compliance training for new employees.

title: Internal Audit Procedures
content: Managers must prepare quarterly compliance reports and submit them for internal audit. Access to this document is limited to department heads.

title: Annual HR Training Calendar
content: The training schedule includes DEI workshops, harassment prevention, and mental health seminars organized by HR.

title: IT System Maintenance Schedule
content: Scheduled downtimes for server maintenance, patch updates, and database backups. Only IT staff should access this document.
